title: Smart Glasses with Voice Assistance and GPS for Independent Mobility of the Blind People
description: Developed IoT-based smart glasses with voice guidance and GPS, enhancing navigation, mobility, and independence for the visually impaired.

title: Flight Delay and Cancellation Analysis using PowerBI
description: Developed an interactive Power BI dashboard to analyze flight cancellations by routes, airlines, and delay reasons, providing actionable insights and helping identify trends for better decision-making.

title: MobileMart - Online Shopping Website
description: Developed an online mobile shopping website with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL, enabling users to browse and purchase mobile phones efficiently.

title: FlicksHub - Movie Ticket Booking System
description: Designed a movie ticket booking system integrating user accounts, enhancing experience and boosting efficiency by streamlining seat selection and payment processes.
